sep.gaia.renderer.layer

Class POILayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.renderer.layer.AbstractLayer
      • sep.gaia.renderer.layer.POILayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableLayer

    public class POILayer
extends AbstractLayer
    For all POIs appearing on the current map section, a appropriate icon will be drawn.
    Author:
    Johannes Bauer, Matthias Fisch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      POILayer(POIAdapter adapter)
      Initializes the layer with its adapter, which used for retrieving textures and GL-coordinates of the entities to draw.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl, float height)
      Draws all POIs available for the current view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • POILayer

        public POILayer(POIAdapter adapter)
        Initializes the layer with its adapter, which used for retrieving textures and GL-coordinates of the entities to draw.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The adapter that this layer should use.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
        float height)
        Draws all POIs available for the current view. Also all OpenGL-specific work in the adapter must be performed here.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface DrawableLayer
        Specified by:
        draw in class AbstractLayer
        Parameters:
        gl - The GL context in which the layers renders its content.
        height - The logical height of this layer. If a layer l2 should be drawn over l1, that are drawn via l1.draw(gl, h1) and l2.draw(gl, h2) respectively, then h2 must be greater than h1.
